name: HSP_BKT_ACT_WO_TX
description: This table contains the unique IDs of actual allowance write off transactions that are associated with liability buckets.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bucket record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACT_ALLOWD_HTR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the actual allowed write-off transaction that is associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account to which the liability bucket is linked.
